code: var urlMovies='https://api.nomoreparties.co/beatfilm-movies';var checkResponse=function checkResponse(response){if(response.ok){return response.json();}return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430 ".concat(response.status));};export var getMovies=function getMovies(){return fetch("".concat(urlMovies),{headers:{'Content-type':'application/json'}}).then(checkResponse);};
